dct_title_s: Nova totius terrarum orbis geographica ac hydrographica tabula
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Map within illustrative border depicting the 7 planets, the 7 wonders of the world, the 4 elements and the 4 seasons. Includes inset maps of the north and south polar regions and 3 ornamental cartouches.
